oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mr. Clement explaining tobacco farming in the county
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Clement, W.L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this excerpt, Clement explains the processes of chopping and spearing tobacco; he also describes the photograph in item number T-2112-1.
